channel.title: CVE Feed for CHANGING Information Technology -- HWATAIServiSign Windows Version
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CHANGING Information Technology -- HWATAIServiSign Windows Version

item.title: CVE-2024-40723|2024-08-02T16:05:52.255Z -- changing%20information%20technology -- hwataiservisign%20windows%20version
item.description: The specific API in HWATAIServiSign Windows Version from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate the length of server-side inputs. When a user visits a spoofed website, unauthenticated remote attackers can cause a stack-based buffer overflow in the HWATAIServiSign, temporarily disrupting its service.
